qualities.name: Gross Floor Area
qualities.description: The gross floor area encompasses all floor areas within the external dimensions of a building.

qualities.name: Net Floor Area
qualities.description: The net floor area is the usable floor area excluding construction elements.

qualities.name: Usable Floor Area
qualities.description: The usable floor area includes all areas directly used for the building's intended purpose.

qualities.name: Living And Staying Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area designated for living and staying purposes including residential and common areas.

qualities.name: Living Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for actual living rooms and main residential spaces.

qualities.name: Living Floor Area
qualities.description: The main living area floor space including living rooms and associated areas.

qualities.name: Kitchen Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area designated for kitchen facilities.

qualities.name: Sanitary Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for sanitary facilities including bathrooms and toilets.

qualities.name: Circulation Floor Area (Living)
qualities.description: Circulation areas within living spaces.

qualities.name: Outdoor Seating Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for outdoor seating and relaxation areas.

qualities.name: Storage Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area designated for storage purposes.

qualities.name: Common Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for common rooms and shared spaces.

qualities.name: Break Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area designated for break rooms and rest areas.

qualities.name: Waiting Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for waiting rooms and reception areas.

qualities.name: Dining Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area designated for dining rooms and eating areas.

qualities.name: Detention Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for detention rooms and secure spaces.

qualities.name: Office Work Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area designated for office work and administrative functions.

qualities.name: Office Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for individual office rooms.

qualities.name: Open Plan Office Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for open plan office spaces.

qualities.name: Meeting Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for meeting rooms and conference spaces.

qualities.name: Design Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for design rooms and drafting spaces.

qualities.name: Counter Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for counter rooms and service areas.

qualities.name: Control Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for control rooms and monitoring spaces.

qualities.name: Supervision Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for supervision rooms and oversight spaces.

qualities.name: Office Technology Room Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for office technology rooms and equipment spaces.

qualities.name: Other Office Work Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area for other office work spaces not classified elsewhere.

qualities.name: Production Experiments Work Floor Area
qualities.description: Floor area designated for production work, experiments and manufacturing activities.

qualities.description: Floor area for plant cultivation and greenhouse facilities.

qualities.name: Property Area
qualities.description: Total area of the property including built and unbuilt areas.

qualities.name: Built Up Area
qualities.description: Area of the property that is built up with structures.

qualities.name: Unbuilt Area
qualities.description: Area of the property that is not built up with structures.

qualities.description: Area designated for vehicular traffic and transportation.

qualities.name: Sidewalk Area
qualities.description: Area designated for sidewalks and pedestrian walkways.

qualities.name: Driveway Area
qualities.description: Area designated for driveways and vehicle access roads.

qualities.name: Parking Space Area
qualities.description: Area designated for parking spaces and vehicle storage.

qualities.description: Area designated for bicycle parking and storage.

qualities.name: Turning Area
qualities.description: Area designated for vehicle turning and maneuvering.

qualities.name: Other Traffic Area
qualities.description: Area for other traffic-related facilities not classified elsewhere.

qualities.name: Green Area
qualities.description: Area designated for green spaces and vegetation.
